testcase.name: Config pairs parse floating-point values
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Config pairs parse floating-point values When I parse config pairs: ... passed in 0.000s | pair | | threshold=0.5 | Then the parsed config value "threshold" is float 0.5 ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Config pairs reject empty keys
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Config pairs reject empty keys When I attempt to parse config pairs: ... passed in 0.000s | pair | | =1 | Then a config parsing error is raised ... passed in 0.000s And the config parsing error mentions "Config keys must be non-empty" ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Config pairs preserve string values
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Config pairs preserve string values When I parse config pairs: ... passed in 0.000s | pair | | mode=fast | Then the parsed config value "mode" is string "fast" ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Step specs reject empty strings
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Step specs reject empty strings When I attempt to parse an empty step spec ... passed in 0.000s Then a step spec parsing error is raised ... passed in 0.000s And the step spec parsing error mentions "Step spec must be non-empty" ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
